title: Quotes from internet tycoons and investors at WIC
text:
Welcome board is deployed on the way to Wuzhen Hall, the main venue for the sixth World Internet Conference, in Wuzhen, East China's Zhejiang province, Oct 17, 2019. [Photo/IC]

Themed "Intelligent Interconnection for Openness and Cooperation: Building a Community with a Shared Future in Cyberspace", the 6th World Internet Conference kicked off on Sunday.

Lei Jun, Robin Li, Yang Yuanqing and other internet tycoons delivered great speeches at the three-day event.

Let's take a look at some key moments from their speeches.
description: Themed "Intelligent Interconnection for Openness and Cooperation: Building a Community with a Shared Future in Cyberspace", the 6th World Internet Conference kicked off on Sunday.
